entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
